alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 6:38PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Morrill and southeastern Sioux Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 538 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Minatare, or 15 miles east of Scottsbluff, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsbluff, Alliance, Gering, Bayard, Terrytown, Minatare, Lake Minatare Campground, Angora, Kilpatrick Lake, Berea, Flahertys Corner, Moomaws Corner, Scottsbluff Airport, Lake Minatare, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62, Lake Alice and Northport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
